title: UK fraudster who faked coma to avoid trial is jailed
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
A British fraudster who faked a coma to avoid prosecution has been jailed for obstructing justice. … Click to Continue »... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
